answers.a: A system that can be connected to the internet
answers.b: A system that is built into a larger device or machine
answers.c: A system that requires no external components to function
answers.d: A system that can only be programmed using assembly language

questions.question: Which of the following should a microcontroller at-least should consist of?

answers.a: CPU, ROM, I/O ports, and timers
answers.b: RAM, ROM, I/O ports, and timers
answers.c: CPU, RAM, I/O ports, and timers
answers.d: CPU, RAM, ROM, I/O ports, and timers

questions.question: Which of the following file extension that is loaded in a microcontroller for executing any instruction?
Which of the following microcontroller doesn’t match with its architecture below?
What is the difference between a microcontroller and a microprocessor?

answers.a: A microcontroller has more processing power than a microprocessor
answers.b: A microcontroller contains both memory and input/output peripherals, whereas a microprocessor does not
answers.c: A microcontroller is used in personal computers, while a microprocessor is used in embedded systems
answers.d: There is no difference between a microcontroller and a microprocessor
